text: wyustthna min alhukm alssabiq almushrikun aldhyn dakhaluu maeakum fi eahd muhadad bmdt, walam ykhwnu alehd, walam yeawnu ealaykum 'ahadana min alaeda', fakmlu lahum eahdahum 'iilaa nihayatih almhdwd. 'iina allah yuhibu almutaqin aladhin addu ma 'umiruu bh, wataquu alshirk walkhyant, waghayr dhlk min almeasy
